participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Practical and down-to-earth, Emily values substance over style and has a competitive spirit.
participant_1.background: i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i compete in dog agility classes.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Calm and introspective, Liam approaches life with a reflective mindset and a strong connection to his spiritual beliefs.
participant_2.background: i like meditation. i've not spoken in three months. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i'm a buddhist.
